data.title: 253 - "ARMY OF SAMBRE AND MEUSE. Division of MONTAIGU." …
data.meta_description: 253 - "ARMY OF SAMBRE AND MEUSE. Division of MONTAIGU." Military leave signed by Generals Anne Charles Basset de MONTAIGU, Louis THORY Pierre Charles DUMOULIN and the Council of the 162 ½ Infantry Brigade. Done in OSSUM 19 Frimaire year 3 (3 Dec. 1794). Leave of reform for André FAUCHEUX, former Sergeant. Certify that he was seriously wounded at the Affair of FAMARS in 1793 (Old Style), while fighting the Satellites of the Tyrants, crippled, was at the Siege of Valenciennes. Patent (21,5 x 37 cm)
